short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check how much carbon dioxide you emit for each flight you take and how many trees you would need to plan to offset.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Download this extension to see the amount of carbon dioxide each flight will emit right on Google Flights so you can see how many trees you will need to plant to offset your cost.

Only works on https://flights.google.com/
